amendment.description: At the end of division B (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. ___. There is appropriated, for salaries and expenses of the Office of Technology Assessment as authorized by the Technology Assessment Act of 1972 (2 U.S.C. 471 et seq.) $2,500,000, to be derived from a reduction of $2,647,000 in the amount provided in this Act for the item for "Architect of the Capitol, Capital Construction and Operations".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 115-259 to appropriate $2.5 million to re-institute the Office of Technology Assessment (OTA), offset from funds from the Architect of the Capitol's Capital Construction and Operations Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 236 (Roll no. 418).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 236 (Roll no. 418).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Takano.
